meaningMnemonic: Remember how you learned that 大腸 means "large intestines?" Well when you get <kanji>bacteria</kanji> in there you end up with <vocabulary>E. Coli</vocabulary>. Go to a doctor right away! You're gonna be stuck in the bathroom for a while. Sorry...
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
